Gangon thought any death would be better than being confined for the rest of
his life...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 30, 2000 7:40 PM
Subject: Hehe







* BrightBlade doesn't notice as the door to her cell opens and Rex walks in,
her consciousness far too depleted to even register him.
The floor was slick with her mech-fluid, and the horrid thing was that she
could taste it in her mouth.
She hardly notices as Rex picks her up and takes her from the cell, but at
the moment of his contact her systems almost seemed to scream in pain,
causing her to convulse slightly with a whimper.the only sound she was able
to muster at the moment.
That Maximals had done this to her, and they where going to PAY!
But first was her repair, then her revenge.
Rex was carrying her off towards the CR chambers, she knew that much. But
jus6t before they exited the room she saw Gangon begin to abuse himself,
almost as if he wanted to end his life.
BrightBlade had risked her life for him and she had maintained his spark
with her own energy cells, and this was they way that he repaid her.by
trying to kill himself?!
If she was able and beside him she would have gave him a good whack right
between the eyes!
She just hoped that he would still be alive when she got back, because if
Perndabot got her message then they would be leaving soon.
BrightBlade felt a shift of weight as she was placed in the CR chamber, her
systems slowly deactivating for repair.
But she would get them for this, for shooting her when she was unarmed. But
she would spare that Rex, for his kind deed he had just acted out.
But soon.SOON!!"
